source.content: Freedom of expression, it seems, should not be taken for granted. RIP to those who died defending it. #JeSuisCharlie http://t.co/MexshKELgv

comment.content: This.  RT @Flowmobs Freedom of expression, it seems, should not be taken for granted.  RIP to those who died defending it. #JeSuisCharlie
